comments: ACC 302 She is very caring, pleasant and personable. However, the class is very difficult, most of the learning had to be done at home. We only went over a few questions in class. There was a disconnect of material, the online lectures did not help to prepare me for the quiz\'s and exams.

comments: Professor Sanderson is amazing. She does her best to make a very difficult class as easy as possible for her students. Very smart and extremely likeable. Would take her for every class you are able to.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (2)  Hilarious (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  Respected (1)  Get ready to read (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: She cares about her students, but strays from the typical format of 301-303 & instead has long-handed quizzes which are given at the beginning of class (no review session or practice quizzes completed in groups beforehand) & exams with multi-choice & long-handed problems, which you must show work on in order to get credit (even on multi-choice Qs).

comments: best teacher i ever had, very informative and she actually cares about you as a person and your success, with her you are not just a number unlike other teachers out there who could not care any less about you or who you become, she is always available and asks to help you when you are struggling whenever it is possible, made accounting fun lol

comments: Very intelligent instructor, makes the material understandable. Quizzes & exams are similar to her practice problems. Tough material overall but she makes it somewhat enjoyable. She can often have \'inside jokes/comments\' with students and you feel out of the loop. Quick to respond to inquiries and is available via text too.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (2)  Hilarious (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  Respected (1)  Get ready to read (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: She puts her students at ease by encouraging them, offering to explain a problem a variety of ways, and being honest about your potential in the class after first grades come in. She practical and understanding. Very approachable - never irritable. She is concerned with her students\' success. Highly recommend her as an instructor.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (2)  Hilarious (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  Respected (1)  Get ready to read (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: She is a really great instructor and excellent career mentor. She is very honest and fair. The course itself is difficult especially for those who have minimal tax experience. Read the chapter, and just keep doing questions. Use her practice questions like a coursepack. The more questions you work through the better you will do on the exams. :)

comments: I\'ve had professor Sanderson for several classes at Walsh College, and she is by far the best professor I\'ve ever had. She explains material very well, prepares you very well for the quizzes and exams, and keeps the class entertaining. I highly suggest taking her for any ACC or TAX class.

comments: To say the least, she gets very off-topic at times during her lectures. She is very hard to follow and hard to pay attention to. Overall she is a below average instructor and I would not recommend her.
